about.title: About Cognitix
about.subtitle: Bringing innovation to every pixel since 2015
about.story: Cognitix was founded with a simple but powerful mission: to help businesses leverage technology to achieve their goals. What started as a small team of passionate developers has grown into a full-service digital agency with a global client base.
about.mission: Our mission is to deliver innovative digital solutions that drive growth and success for our clients. We believe that technology should work for people, not the other way around.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear what our clients have to say

client1.text: Cognitix transformed our business with their outstanding web development services. They delivered our project on time and exceeded our expectations in every way.

client2.text: The Cognitix team is professional, responsive, and incredibly talented. They quickly understood our complex requirements and delivered an exceptional solution.

client3.text: Since the launch of our new e-commerce platform developed by Cognitix, our sales have increased by 40%. Their expertise in design and functionality is unparalleled.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Cognitix. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you how we protect your personal data when you visit our website and will provide information about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

dataWeCollect.title: Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.content: We may collect, use, store, and transfer different types of personal data about you, which we have grouped as follows:
dataWeCollect.personalData: Personally identifiable information (name, email address, phone number)
dataWeCollect.technicalData: Technical data including IP address, browser type and version, time zone and location, operating system and platform
dataWeCollect.usageData: Information about how you use our website and services

howWeUseData.title: How We Use Your Data
howWeUseData.content: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
howWeUseData.toProvideServices: To provide our services and respond to your requests
howWeUseData.toImproveWebsite: To improve the performance of our website
howWeUseData.marketingPurposes: To communicate with you about new services, offers, and other marketing purposes

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience. By continuing to browse the site, you agree to our use of cookies.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices or content.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal data at any time. Please contact us if you wish to exercise these rights.
